creditline: Collection of Joseph A. Murphy, Ph.D.
description:
"A Versailles" engraved on trigger plate, PR side; goose, peacock, dragon and two other birds engraved over trigger plate and flintlock; heavily inlaid with gold; dragon on both sides of handle; butt heavily decorated with roman-type portrait, elephant heads and other images; gold stars inlaid in top of barrel; full male figure on trigger guard with a three dimensional winged female figure above it. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
medium: Walnut, steel, silver gilt; gold, ivory
title: Holster Pistol from set, one of a pair
